app.name: Chocolate HEXEN for Wii
app.short_description: Port of Chocolate HEXEN to the Wii!
app.long_description:
Now you can play Raven Software's HEXEN chocolate style on your Wii!
Compatible with the following IWAD's:
- HEXEN 4-Level-BETA - HEXEN 4-Level-DEMO - HEXEN Retail Store Beta #3 - HEXEN Macintosh DEMO - HEXEN Macintosh Registered - HEXEN Registered v1.0 - HEXEN Registered v1.1
Also runs (YOU NEED THE FULL VERSION OF HEXEN):
- HEXEN - Deathkings of the Dark Citadel v1.0 - HEXEN - Deathkings of the Dark Citadel v1.1
Use the Wiimote to choose your IWAD.
Press A to select the device / WAD file. Press B to go back in the menu. Use the cursors to scroll up / down in the list. Finally, press button 1 to load the game.
Upon startup you have to be patient as the game checks the IWAD being loaded.
This Wii-Release also includes PWAD loading possibilities.
